sentence: Republican Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) also spoke at the conference, receiving resounding condemnation, even from within their own party.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Local Reporter Praised For Viral Interview Pushing Idaho Lt. Governor on White Nationalist Ties: ‘As Painful As This is to Watch – It Matters’

sentence: Other speakers at AFPAC included Republican Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (Ga.) and Paul Gosar (Ariz.), and Arizona state Sen. Wendy Rogers, also a Republican.
author: Josephine Harvey
title: Idaho Lt. Gov. Ends Interview After Being Pressed About White Nationalist Ties

sentence: She tweeted a photograph at AFPAC with Fuentes and United States Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Georgia), who along with Congressman Paul Gosar (R-Arizona) was a guest of honor.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Twitter torches Idaho's Republican lieutenant governor for kanoodling with White supremacists

sentence: She has been defending her decision to address a white supremacist gathering in Florida — which put her in the company of extremist GOP Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar — and gone on the attack against authorities over a mistreated 10-month-old being taken from his family and put in protective custody.
author: Mark Z. Barabak
title: Is Trump losing his mojo?
